update.description:
Default currently has [39 warnings](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/SdformatDefault/job/sdformat-ci-default-windows7-amd64/16/warnings34Result/)

This branch leaves [1 warning](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/40/warnings34Result/)

~~I tried a few things to fix the remaining warning, which you can see in the commit history, but nothing worked. The warning (C4251) happens because the `std::unique_ptr` is not properly exported to dll. ~~

**Update:**

[0 warnings](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/48/)
update.title: Fix all Windows warnings

content.raw:
voila, [zero warnings](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/48/)

And in fact, we've disabled 4251 in other places too:

~~~
$ grep -r " 4251" include/
include/sdf/Element.hh:#pragma warning(disable: 4251)
include/sdf/SDFImpl.hh:#pragma warning(disable : 4251)
include/sdf/Console.hh:#pragma warning(disable: 4251)
~~~
content.html:
voila, zero warnings

And in fact, we've disabled 4251 in other places too:

$ grep -r " 4251" include/
include/sdf/Element.hh:#pragma warning(disable: 4251)
include/sdf/SDFImpl.hh:#pragma warning(disable : 4251)
include/sdf/Console.hh:#pragma warning(disable: 4251)

content.raw: Oh that's interesting that they just ignore it. I'd be inclined to ignore it here as well unless someone is against it.
content.html: Oh that's interesting that they just ignore it. I'd be inclined to ignore it here as well unless someone is against it.

content.raw: Apparently is a well known issue: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/32098001/stdunique-ptr-pimpl-in-dll-generates-c4251-with-visual-studio .
content.html: Apparently is a well known issue: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/32098001/stdunique-ptr-pimpl-in-dll-generates-c4251-with-visual-studio .

content.raw:
Just found this note on warning `C4251` on ProtoBuf documentation: https://github.com/google/protobuf/tree/master/cmake#notes-on-compiler-warnings , 
but I did not check the details of why they argue to simply disable the warning.
content.html: Just found this note on warning C4251 on ProtoBuf documentation: https://github.com/google/protobuf/tree/master/cmake#notes-on-compiler-warnings , but I did not check the details of why they argue to simply disable the warning.

content.raw: After a few more tries the warning didn't disappear.
content.html: After a few more tries the warning didn't disappear.
